title: Julian Lin's Highest Conviction Idea (Ever)? Cannabis.
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Julian Lin, from our MasterClass episodes, has a new cannabis focused marketplace service, Cannabis Growth Portfolio. We discuss his thoughts on EBITDA, ETFs using total return swaps to own US MSOs, rebalancing away from Canadian operators. Uplisting is the clearest catalyst for cannabis stocks. Tilray coming for the US. Legalization is not the thesis to owning cannabis stocks. California concerns. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
